doc:
Adriana Caselotti https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adriana_Caselotti 0 Adriana Caselotti (May 6, 1916 – January 18, 1997) was an American actress, voice actress and singer. Caselotti was the voice of the title character of the first Walt Disney animated feature Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, for which she was named as a Disney Legend in 1994, making her the first female voice actor so named. Adriana_Caselotti ( May_6_,_1916 – January_18_,_1997 ) was an_American_actress , voice_actress_and_singer . Caselotti was the_voice of the_title_character of the_first_Walt_Disney_animated_feature_Snow_White and the_Seven_Dwarfs , for which she was_named as a_Disney_Legend in 1994 , making her the_first_female_voice_actor so named .
